snippet: The decorator show house is in an apartment building for only the second time in 40 years.
abstract: Kips Bay Decorator Show House will be held, for the second time in 40 years, on the Upper West Side, rather than at an Upper East Side town house.
lead_paragraph: The decorator show house is in an apartment building for only the second time in 40 years.
